job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Outstanding quantitative background. Minimum of a master's degree (Ph.D. preferred) in Computer Science, Statistics, Math, Physics or other related technical fields.
7 + years of professional experience in developing AI/ML or statistical models and solutions.
Deep understanding of statistics, machine learning techniques, their mathematical concepts, and industry trends.
Solid production engineering development experience with Python, SQL, Sklean, TensorFlow, PyTorch or any of the prevailing AI/ML frameworks.
Proficient understanding of ETL processes, model lifecycle management, and engineering design standard methodologies.
